ygData.subject: Re: Hunting at 14..
ygData.msgSnippet: I can kill nearly all fire elementals in Lavastorm at level 13, most near the entrance /con blue to me... And they give quite a good amount of exp. Lava
ygData.messageBody:
I can kill nearly all fire elementals in Lavastorm at level 13, most near
the entrance /con blue to me... And they give quite a good amount of exp.
Lava basilisks are good targets as well.

Giltaagin

>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>Try lavastorm, just make sure you have a good pet. and stick to drakes at
>14, avoid elementals :)
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: johnathan spectre <jspectre@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Monday, July 05, 1999 7:41 PM
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting at 14..
